title: Introduction to Candle Making
subtitle: Create your own scented and decorative candles at home.
description: This course covers everything you need to know to get started with candle making, including wax types, fragrance oils, and wicks.

title: Advanced Candle Art: Layering & Design
subtitle: Master advanced techniques to create multi-layered and sculpted candles.
description: For those with some experience, this course teaches you how to create complex designs, including layered colors, sculpted shapes, and embedding items.

title: Stained Glass Art: Tiffany Method
subtitle: Learn the classic Tiffany method to create beautiful stained glass panels.
description: This course guides you through the process of creating stained glass art, from cutting glass to copper foiling and soldering.

title: Glass Blowing Fundamentals
subtitle: An introduction to the exhilarating art of glass blowing.
description: This course covers the basics of working with molten glass, including safety, tools, and the fundamental techniques to create simple glass forms.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
subtitle: A complete guide to passing the AWS SAA-C03 exam.
description: This course is designed for those with some AWS experience. It covers architectural best practices and prepares you for the Solutions Architect Associate certification exam.

title: CISSP Exam Prep: Domain 1 & 2
subtitle: A focused review of the first two domains of the CISSP exam.
description: This course provides an in-depth review of Security and Risk Management and Asset Security, two key domains on the CISSP exam. Includes practice questions and quizzes.

title: CISSP Practice Questions & Labs
subtitle: Practice for the CISSP exam with scenario-based questions.
description: This course is focused on practice, with hundreds of scenario-based questions and hands-on labs to help you prepare for the CISSP exam.

title: Microsoft Azure AZ-900 Certification
subtitle: A complete guide to the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals exam.
description: This course prepares you for the AZ-900 exam, covering foundational Azure concepts, cloud services, and security.

title: Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst
subtitle: Pass the PL-300 exam with this comprehensive course.
description: This course is for those looking to become a certified Power BI Data Analyst. It covers data modeling, visualization, and report creation.

title: Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect
subtitle: Prepare for the GCP Cloud Architect certification exam.
description: This course covers the key topics and best practices for the Google Cloud Architect exam, including solution design, infrastructure, and security.

title: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
subtitle: A comprehensive program to become a data analyst.
description: This course is part of the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate. It teaches you how to collect, transform, and analyze data to drive business decisions.
